Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I don't... <sp:5:0:0>No, I don't like that.
Something else please!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh... Are you so in need of rupees that
you're selling the clothes right off your
back? That's not quite how I do things.
GreetingAfter00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Votta!<sp:5:1:0> Oh, a Hylian...<sp:5:0:0> In that case...


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Good born...<sp:5:0:0> Good norn...<sp:5:0:0> No, that's not
it. <sp:5:1:0>Ummm...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Morneg!<sp:5:1:0> Good morneg! That's it, right?!
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Hey! Is this some kind of haggling
technique?<sp:5:0:0> You know being short and
succinct is all the rage now, right?
GreetingAfter01: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Sav'a!<sp:5:1:0> Oh, a Hylian...<sp:5:0:0> In that case...
GreetingAfter02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Neh...<sp:5:0:0> Mih...<sp:5:0:0> No, that's not right...<sp:5:1:0>
Hmmm...<sp:5:1:0> Oh!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Hel-eye! That's it, right?!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa, hold on! You can't just cram meat
of this quality into an already-overloaded
pouch! Make some space first!
GreetingAfter03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Let's see... Vasaaq was...bell...<sp:5:0:0> Cell...<sp:5:0:0> Oh!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Dellcam! That's it, right?!
GreetingAfter04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Good oven...<sp:5:0:0> Good ivan...<sp:5:0:0> No, that's not
right...<sp:5:1:0> Hmmm...<sp:5:1:0> Oh!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Good eveny! That's it, right?!
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I traveled the world a long time agoâ€”
that's how I learned so much about the
differences between our languages.
The Upheaval has put a stop to that,
though. I can feel my encyclopedic
knowledge of language slipping away...
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>But hey, the sand shroud cleared up.
Maybe the Upheaval will follow suit!

I hope that's the case. I heard a <clr:0000>new kind
of creature<clr:ffff> was recently discovered, and
I'd love to see it.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Great! Show me what you'd like to sell!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The sand shroud cleared up eventually,
so I bet the Upheaval will sort itself
out too!
I hope that's the case. I heard a <clr:0000>new kind
of creature<clr:ffff> was recently discovered, and
I'd love to see it.
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Are you sure there isn't anything else
you'd like to sell? Come on, show me!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Before the Upheaval happened, a traveler
mentioned it to me...

A new kind of creature was discovered in
<clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>. I heard they're keeping some at
<clr:0000>Lakeside Stable<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If you wanted to get to Faron from here,
you'd just have to head east and keep
going.<sp:5:1:0> And going. <sp:5:1:0>And going.<sp:5:1:0>
A new creature... Pretty good reason to
travel there, yeah?

I wouldn't hunt it, of course! To kill a
brand-new discovery without a second
thought... <sp:5:1:0>No way.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>But as something of a hunter, I'd need to
see this new meat with my own eyes!

<sp:3:0:2:0400>Er, did I say meat? <sp:5:1:0>I meant creature.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Ummm... Sarq was... It started with a T,
right?<sp:5:0:0> T... <sp:5:0:0>Oh!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Tank you! Tank you berry such!
That's it, right?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy>Oh wow! You've got that pronunciation
down! What was it in your language...

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Goooooo-eye!
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Sarq!


If this keeps up, the only thing stopping
me from traveling will be the Upheaval!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Keep buying my stock! The more you buy,
the closer I get to traveling again!
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I'll grill up some more meat to have ready
for you the next time you visit!
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What? You changed your mind?<sp:5:0:0>
Well, OK then...
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I really appreciate you buying up all the
meat I had for sale. Really. It means a lot!
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Sarq! Looks like I've got to go hunt some
more, huh?
Com_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You can always sell lots to me! If you want
to, that is.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>One day, I'll be able to travel. I should
start saving now so I can hit the road the
moment it's not so dangerous!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Seeing the things you carry with you...
It really sparks my traveler's spirit! 

I want to get out there and see this
<clr:0000>new kind of creature<clr:ffff> I've heard about.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I haven't been able to travel in some time.
I hope I can refresh those memories...

<sp:3:0:2:0101>But hey, the sand shroud cleared up.
Maybe the Upheaval will follow suit!

I hope that's the case. I heard a <clr:0000>new kind
of creature<clr:ffff> was recently discovered, and
I'd love to see it.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You've cleaned me out! Sarq!


Every sale brings me one step closer to
being able to travel someday...
